ctu_text: "}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 1, "value": "cash", "label": "Cash"}, "benefits": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Under the scheme, the subsidy will be provided to the MSMEs for training; subject to a maximum of \u20b92000/- per month per candidate for a maximum of 6 months. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Certificates will be provided by the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC), after the assessment of acquired skills by the trained candidates. "}]}]}]}]}, "applicationProcess": [{"mode": "Online", "process": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Step 01:", "bold": true}, {"text": " The applicant (MSME) may apply online through the "}, {"type": "link", "link": "https://www. msmeonline.
caption: Poster 1/4 – Benefits (numbers verified)

ctu_text: \n"}, {"mode": "Offline", "process": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The MSME unit fulfilling all the necessary eligibility criteria may contact the following offices to avail of the benefits of the scheme:"}]}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "1. \tThe office of the Commissionerate of Industries and Commerce at the State level,"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "2. \tThe office of the Regional Joint Director of Industries and Commerce for Chennai district,"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "3. \tThe office of the General Managers of District Industries Centre for other districts in Tamil Nadu.
caption: Poster 2/4 – Eligibility (numbers verified)

ctu_text:
**Step 03:** If not registered, click on ‘Register’ and fill in all mandatory details. 
**Step 04:** After successful registration, click on ‘login’ to apply for the scheme. 
**Step 05:** Fill in all the mandatory details in the application form and upload all the necessary documents. 
**Step 06:** Submit the application form.

ctu_text: \n1. The trainees selected by the applicant (MSME) shall be between 18 to 25 years of age. \n1. The trainees selected by the applicant shall have an engineering degree, a polytechnic diploma, or an Industrial Training Institute (ITI) certificate, or qualification as prescribed by the respective sector skill council.
